MonsterTrait.Name: Deathly Choir
MonsterTrait.Text: Any creature within 10 feet of Rahadin that isn't protected by a mind blank spell hears in its mind the screams of the thousands of people Rahadin has killed. As a bonus action, Rahadin can force all creatures that can hear the screams to make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. Each creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MonsterTrait.Name: Fey Ancestry
MonsterTrait.Text: Rahadin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
Rahadin's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
3/day: misty step, phantom steed
1/day: magic weapon, nondetection

MonsterTrait.Name: Mask of the Wild
MonsterTrait.Text: Rahadin can attempt to hide even when he is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: Rahadin attacks three times with his scimitar, or twice with his poisoned darts.

MonsterAction.Name: Scimitar
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d6+6) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Poisoned Dart
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d4+6) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.
